header.title: The best fence installation company in Fair Oaks
bullets: Create, review and edit your FREE quote online using our custom tool.
Ask questions to our friendly, responsive team.
Understand what’s included with your project with our transparent quotes and pricing.
Enjoy your new fence built by our team of skilled local craftsmen.

Yelp.description: I was really happy with Ergeon's communication and services. From the start, there was always someone available on the phone to help. I was able to do a video call to walk them through the scope and they turned around with a thorough quote in 2 days, broken down by line item. They were competitively priced. The install was scheduled within a week and completed in less than a day. Great craftsmanship, easy communication, and well priced for the quality. Would definitely recommend to anyone in the Sacramento area.
Yelp.name: Jeffrey Y.
Yelp.title: I was really happy with Ergeon's communication and services.

Google.description: Ergeon did a wonderful job. Initial communication very thorough. Software simulation for how my fence would look was awesome. I had complete control to make my fence how I wanted and with the type of materials I wanted. The install crew removed and installed over 100 feet of fence in one day!! They also left the job site as they found it. Overall a very pleasant project experience.
Google.name: Thomas F.
Google.title: Overall a very pleasant project experience

articles.description: If you’re looking to get a new fence in California, it’s important to know about the laws surrounding fences and home improvement projects. Our post will go over some important things to keep in mind.

When it’s time to get a new fence it’s important to always use a reputable, licensed, and insured contractor. Some people try to cut costs by using unlicensed contractors, but this can end up being a major issue if any problems happen during the installation or down the line. In this post, we’ll go over the main reasons why you should always use a licensed and insured fence contractor.

There’s a lot to consider when weighing the pros and cons of a wood fence versus a chain link fence. We’ve tried to make the process easier for you by diving deeper into some of the areas of consideration.
